text:
Continued research and public health 
efforts are necessary to provide more personalized 
nutritional guidelines and improve overall pregnancy 
health. 
Funding: No funding sources 
Conflict of interest: None declared 
Ethical approval: Not required 
REFERENCES 
1. Harris RJ, Coughlin BF , Richardson LR. Folic acid 
and the prevention of neural tube defects. Am J Pub 
Heal. 2007;97(3):422-4. 
2. Cook JD, Reddy MB,  Hurrell RF. The effect of iron
